fields.text: Thank you for calling Chime, the fastest growing challenger bank committed to helping you achieve financial peace of mind.
Press [INDEX] for account services, including balance inquiries and transfers.
Press [INDEX] to check your balance and view recent transactions.
Please hold for the next available account specialist.
Press [INDEX] to make mobile check deposits or transfer funds.
Please hold while we connect you to our mobile deposits team.
Press [INDEX] for debit card support and transaction disputes.
Press [INDEX] to report a lost or stolen card.
Please hold while we connect you to our card support specialists.
Press [INDEX] to dispute a recent transaction.
Please hold while we connect you to our disputes team.
